alert.note: Alert for Johnson; Washington; Wilkinson (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued March 21 at 9:27PM EDT until March 23 at 5:37AM EDT by NWS Atlanta
info.description: ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Georgia... Oconee River near Oconee affecting Wilkinson, Washington and Johnson Counties. ...FLOOD WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL EARLY WEDNESDAY MORNING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring. * WHERE...Oconee River near Oconee. * WHEN...Until early Wednesday morning. * IMPACTS...At 17 feet, Flood stage is reached. The water level reaches the top of the Old Balls Ferry Road boat ramp, just upstream and right-bank from the Georgia Highway 57 bridge. Minor flooding of woodlands near the river occurs. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 9:00 PM EDT Monday the stage was 17.5 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise to a crest of 17.6 feet just after midnight tonight. It will then fall below flood stage late Tuesday morning. - Flood stage is 17 feet. &&
info.instruction: Stay tuned to further developments by listening to your local radio, television, or NOAA Weather Radio for further information. Additional information is available at weather.gov/atlanta.
